add:
df = pd.DataFrame(np.linspace(1, 100, 5), columns=["num"])
ds = dataspace.from_df(df)
print("Adding a column with default value")
ds.add("num2", 1)
ds.show()
bar_:
data = {"col1": ["A", "B", "C", "D", "E"], "col2": [1, 6, 2, 4, 1]}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)
ds = dataspace.from_df(df)
ds.bar_("col1:N", "col2:Q").to_json()
